# Crypto-格密码

## 题意
`easy.py`，math is all you need

## 题解

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import invert
h = 31197036442579936699848975881635196461489816459701596239052285876008933121026950776940833024574588854170505988239672234077468193544
p = 95839660644812096134448182189130252913123457151920554007253392900712044748264493802783906985522598490959801711560168732109303713837
c = 76715816867236213629123822390537853854544431582968140366066866503791778854725051043168076232498950433788691112987281128339942318249
mat = [[0, p], [1, h]]
M = Matrix(ZZ, mat)
a, g = M.LLL()[0]
m = (a*c % p*invert(a, g)*invert(a, g)) % g
flag = long_to_bytes(int(m))
print(flag)
```
